p: At Las Pajareras, the best model for capture probability of A. sylvaticus accounted for a positive relationship with the number of traps ( Supplementary Table S3). From this model, we estimated an average daily capture probability that resulted to be the highest we found (0.524; SE = 0.073) among all the species and sites. For A. sylvaticus, we found a positive relationship of number of traps on capture probability also at Las Monjas ( Supplementary Table S4). The average daily probability of capture was 0.223 ( SE = 0.096).
